name: scandium oxide to generic market for electrolyte, for solid oxide fuel cell | electrolyte, for solid oxide fuel cell | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/25029/documentation

This activity links scandium oxide to the generic market for electrolyte used in solid oxide fuel cells. According to CM Group, the solid oxide fuel cell market, which uses scandium oxide (among others) as an electrolyte, represented around 76% of the consumption of scandium oxide in 2018.;The product "electrolyte, for solid oxide fuel cell" should be used only in cases where the specific electrolyte is not known. The two electrolytes that supply the market for electrolyte, for solid oxide fuel cell are scandium oxide and zirconium oxide.;Reference:;CM Group. Scandium. https://www.cmgroup.net/industries/scandium/ (last accessed: 2021-07-29).

The activity starts with the reception of scandium oxide.

The activity ends with the renaming of scandium oxide to a generic electrolyte, which supplies the market for electrolyte, for solid oxide fuel cell. As this is a renaming activity, no other inputs or outputs are included.
